did.unittitle: Interruptions to School at Home by Harriette Simpson Arnow, Adena, Vol. 5, No. 1 (Spring 1980) p. 40-55.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Photograph of HSA and James Still on p. 17. This excerpt from Belle is probably an earlier version of Chapter IV in the Typescript Version.
